title: Sweet moment patriotic FedEx man fixes the order of stars and stripes cushions on porch
text:
This is the sweet moment a patriotic FedEx man fixes the order of stars and stripes cushions on a porch during his delivery round.

The unnamed worker can be seen rearranging the soft furnishings so that they make the American flag, moving the stripes pillow so it is to the right of the stars.

Jackie Szabo posted the clip online on Wednesday after her home security cameras in Ashland, Ohio, captured the kind act.

She told Fox 35: 'It is sweet. My son is an Airborne Soldier and a veteran in US Army so it's extra special to me.'

Homeowner Jackie wrote: 'When the Fed Ex guy puts the stars before the stripes.'

Facebook users loved his sweet act, with one dubbing him 'awesome'.

Another said: 'I love that he took the time, he has places to be and packages to deliver but he took the time. Little things matter and tell a person's heart...'

And one wrote: 'This is the best thing i have seen in a long time.. I love this!'
